---
name: User Story
about: User story to describe work to be done.

**As a** [role]  
**I need** [function]  
**So that** [benefit]  
      
### Details and Assumptions
    * [document what you know]      

### Acceptance Criteria     
```gherkin
Given [some context]
When [certain action is taken]
Then [the outcome of action is observed]
```
